item.description:
I will need 25 people to help setup the day before the Wings and Wheels event. We will be joined by another 25 people from the car club and airport personnel. We will probably be there until at least 2pm. Lunch will be provided.

We will be


  • putting be marking boudaries
  • moving airplanes into position
  • setting up tables/tents
  • etc



Please RSVP for yourself, plus any family members that can come to help setup. Family members are encouraged to come and we will probably have a cook out after.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Wings and Wheels Setup
